annotation.description: This annotation is used to mark a pattern as a query definition for a query-based feature.
annotation.name: QueryBasedFeature

annotationparameter.description: The name of the EStructuralFeature that the query will serve.
annotationparameter.name: feature

annotationparameter.description: The name of the parameter that is the source of the derived feature.
annotationparameter.name: source

annotationparameter.description: Possible values: single, many, counter, sum, iteration (default: feature.isMany?many:single)
annotationparameter.name: kind

annotationparameter.description: In case of single and many reference features, it is possible to disable the caching (this may free up some memory but result in slightly lowerr performance (default: true).
annotationparameter.name: keepCache
